b:= proc(n, s, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, x^(t-s),
add(b(n-j, min(s, j), max(t, j)), j=1..n))
seq(seq(A(n, d-n), n=0..d), d=0..11);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Jan 05 2019
mathematica: b[n_, k_, s_, t_] := b[n, k, s, t] = If[n < 0, 0, If[n == 0, 1, Sum [b[n - j, k, Min[s, j], Max[t, j]], {j, Max[1, t - k + 1], s + k - 1}]]]; A[n_, k_] := If[n == 0, 1, Sum[b[n - j, k + 1, j, j], {j, 1, n}]]; Table[Table[A[n, d - n], {n, 0, d}], {d, 0, 11}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 27 2013, translated from Maple *)
